website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a hook for smaller umbrella poles, give this one a try.
pros: Polypropylene with screw thread fastening system
Fits poles from .75 to 1.26 inches in diameter
Can place high up the pole to hide valuables
cons: May not fit some larger beach umbrellas, so be sure to measure before ordering

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the smaller beach umbrellas like the tommy Bahama ones but it was paired by ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the smaller beach umbrellas like the tommy Bahama ones but it was paired by amazon as a suggested buy for our commercial grade larger umbrella and it does not fit. Amazon should spend more time researching compatibility of products before pairing them and putting as suggested buys to enhance product we were buying which was the umbrella. Annoying
customer_reviews.author: peter lake

customer_reviews.title: The best small thing that i brought with to the beach
customer_reviews.text: Very very handy! Hung everything on this including a blue tooth speaker, towels, glasses, hats. Its so cheap and worked great
customer_reviews.author: Vantard

customer_reviews.title: Beach Octopus
customer_reviews.text: This is a strange looking piece that fits at the junction of your beach umbrella to hang your personal items. We hung our beach towels on it but they were dragging in the sand and the wind was whipping them around so, I don't recommend it for towel use, especially if you are sitting under the umbrella. Hanging things up under the umbrella also disrupted our view so, I believe this would be more useful when hanging smaller items. After affixing it to the umbrella, It tightens by turning a good sized knob. The strength of it "staying up" is dependent on how tightly you are able to fasten it.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty Counts

customer_reviews.title: Would work for a beach umbrella, but not my patio umbrella with a crank open
customer_reviews.text: I have received this and quickly noticed that it won’t work for my umbrella that cranks open. May work better for beach umbrellas that don’t require the crank to open it. It comes in a solid ring and not hinged or two pieces so that I can place it around the pole and then tighten it above the crank and where it’d be useful to hang a towel or small light ...I would have to dismantle the actual umbrella because I can’t slide it up from the bottom. Too inexpensive to worry about returning.
customer_reviews.author: StopherC

customer_reviews.title: Handy Gadget!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget came in handy at the beach. Perfect for hanging towels up to dry or sunglasses on or hats. I also hung my Bluetooth speaker on it to keep it from getting sand in it!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy01

customer_reviews.title: No more sandy towels!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product had many hooks to hang two towels and several lightweight bags. A must for a beach umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: Fitness 72

customer_reviews.title: hooks were very handy
customer_reviews.text: I liked having these hooks, I've often wished I had somewhere to hang a few items like a camera, radio, phone, t-shirt. So after years of using umbrella spokes or zip lock bags, I thought this idea was a big improvement.
customer_reviews.author: wileykat

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Instead of carrying bungee cords in the beach bags to fill up plastic bags with sand to hold umbrella down, we now weave the handle of our beach bag around the 4 prongs. Terrific Item!
customer_reviews.author: barbara-jean

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize that this gadget that holds towels was basically unusable! I will only slide up the umbrella from the bottom which makes it so low to the ground that the towels are touching the floor, in order to place it higher I had to cut a slot through it but now I won't allow the umbrella to come down all the way! It was an $8 waste of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Work as intended
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are a good thought, but can not hold much weight, put a bag with some towels on one of the hooks and it snapped off. Maybe good enough to hang a towel on, but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Chin

customer_reviews.title: Be cool. Get a book.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for your beach umbrella. Hang your music device, cover-up and towel up out of the sand. Easily fits on any umbrella and makes your feel like a cool know it all when people walk by and admire your hook. Best piece of plastic have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Romana III

customer_reviews.title: Didnt fit my really nice wooden umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Not wide enough inside to fit on very “nice” expensive umbrella, which was a shame, and I had to use it on my backup aluminum umbrella, and it fits tightly. On the really skinny metal umbrella, the interior attachment is needed, which they provide... just don’t purchase if you have a nice thick wooden umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Christian P. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Smart
customer_reviews.text: Super smart these guys, surely they go to the beach a lot and know that without this piece many triples of the market are not of the size of the stick or tube of the umbrella and it is essential that they would sell the glue.

product_meta.title: AMMSUN Beach Umbrella Hanging Hook,4-prongs Plastic Umbrella Hook Hanging for Towels/Hats/Clothes/Camera/Sunglasses/Bags,Fit for Beach,Camping Trips Blue
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY BEACH HOOKS –This umbrella hook is compact and sturdy. Designed from high quality, lightweight and durable polypropylene to ensure the 4 hooks do not snap or break. Provides extra support for larger items such as towels, digital cameras, beach bags as well as small items such as sunglasses,Camera,Phone.

KEEP EVERYTHING UP OFF THE GROUND – Whether you are relaxing at the beach, camping or your patio this is the best Umbrella hook for hanging your stuff. Avoid having sand, water or dirt all over your stuff after having fun at the beach; it’s simply annoying. Enjoy quality time at the beach; hang your towels, hats, clothes, camera, sunglasses, bags and your precious iPhone on this amazing Beach umbrella hanging hook.

EXTREMELY EASY TO INSTALL – No need to worry about installation, no assembly tools are required. Simply position the Umbrella Hook exactly where you want it and fasten the screw to hold in place. The ideal solution for towels, hats, bags and other valuables that you don't want to get sandy, wet and dirty

ADJUSTABLE UNIVERSAL SIZE DESIGN – Very simple yet very useful. This 4-prongs beach hook is thoughtfully designed to firmly fit beach umbrella from 0.75" (19mm) to 1.26" (32mm) diameter beach umbrellas poles. What’s more, it is designed adjustable allowing you to choose how high or low you would like to hang your stuff. Features a screw thread fastening system to ensure a snug and a dependable fit. No more sand! Have fun with peace of mind!

ULTRALIGHT & CONVENIENT – This amazing hook is sturdy enough to hold your items yet lightweight enough for easy portability. Throw it in your car, beach bag or purse. Just ensure you have it the next time you visit the beach, camping site or water park.For any possible questions, contact us via support@ammsun.com

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars757 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
